commit message:
Merge branch 'release/3.6' into develop

Conflicts:
WordPress/src/main/java/org/wordpress/android/ui/stats/StatsUtils.java
WordPress/src/main/java/org/wordpress/android/ui/stats/StatsVisitorsAndViewsFragment.java
3.7-rc-1 / 162 version bump
Make sure the activity is still running when DateChange and PeriodChange callbacks are called.
Use a label formatter for vertical labels in graph that is close, or not the same, of the web version of Stats.
Removed delayed start of reveal animation

Make sure the blogID passed to the server is not blank.
Also make sure to get the lock on the networkCallsList before accessing it.
Use commitAllowingStateLoss instead of commit in loadStatsFragments. This should fix that rare issue where the tapped bar callback is called when the activity has already called onSaveInstanceState.
Used addOnGlobalLayoutListener() to wait for view to be laid out before starting animation
Returned delay so animation occurs after list is populated

Merge pull request #2243 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2239-stats-activity-illegal-state

Stats - Fix illegalStateException in Stats activity
Check position before liking comment, also fix bug in isValidPosition
No longer passing comment to showLikeStatus()
Make sure to check the correct data model index for error datatype
fix #2252: fix npe when opening stats from notifications on 10' landscape tablets

Merge pull request #2250 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2249-reader-oob-liking-comment

Issue/2249 reader oob liking comment

Merge pull request #2244 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2242-Stats-duplicate-Y-Axis

Stats - Fix issue with duplicate labels on the Y-Axis

Merge pull request #2253 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2251-stats-class-cast-comments

Stats - Fix class cast exception in Comments module
Merge branch 'issue/2252-npe-drawer-toggle' into release/3.7

Merge pull request #2247 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2245-reader-reveal-exception

Issue/2245 reader reveal exception

Override `getCount()` so that the adapter pulls the count from the `mNoteBlockList`.

Fixes #2258

Merge pull request #2263 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2258-notes-out-of-index

Fix #2258 by adding getCount() Override
Add few more sanity checks
Renamed local variables
Use isEmpty, instead of isBlank, and do not catch parse exceptions when parsing the BlogID passed to the service (Let it crashing).

Merge pull request #2246 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2241-Stats-service-issues

Make sure the blogID passed to Stats service is not blank.
Use 'replace' rather than 'add' when adding the theme preview fragment

Merge pull request #2268 from wordpress-mobile/update/Stats-add-more-sanity-checks

Stats - Add few more sanity checks
3.7-rc-2 / 163 version bump
remove MEMORY_TRIMMED_COMPLETE mixpanel event

fix #2218: remove MEMORY_TRIMMED_COMPLETE mixpanel event
fix AppLogViewerActivity when a log is message is null
fix potential crash source

fix AppLogViewerActivity when a log message is null
fix #2293: remove leading double slash in URLs returned by wporg servers
comment addUrlSchemeIfNeeded and why removeLeadingDoubleSlash is used there

update translations for 3.7

translations update for 3.7
3.7 / 165 version bump
fix #2336: check for null text entry, replace them with a string
remove ViewPostActivity
Photo viewer no longer uses a separate thread for image scanning, and the adapter is passed the list of images after creation rather than as part of its constructor.
Added exception handler to catch IllegalStateException
Changed to removeGlobalOnLayoutListener()
